name: Denise
placeOfBirth: New Brettland, Turks and Caicos Islands
description: Denise is a green-eyed llama with black hair, standing 111 cm tall. Originally from New Brettland, Turks and Caicos Islands, Denise enjoys cooking, dancing, gardening. Known for their friendly and calm personality, Denise is a beloved member of the llama community.
